<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs=""
>
[Golden Silencer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1585)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 76</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a firearm

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You're an expert in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15).
</row>

</column>

---

The Golden Gunners are dreaded for their use of their _golden silencers_, which they put to good use in clandestine raids. They silence both the loud gunshot and the screams of creatures wounded by its shot. A weapon with a _golden silencer_ attached emits no light and makes no noise when fired. A target hit by a ranged Strike from the affixed weapon must succeed at a DC 20 Fortitude save or be silenced as well until the start of its next turn. A silenced creature can't call for help or use sonic abilities, nor can it use abilities with the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait. This prevents it from casting spells that include verbal components.

</traits>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

---

The save DC is 27, and the silence effect on the target creature lasts for up to 1 minute. The silenced creature can attempt a new Fortitude save at the end of each of its turns to end the duration early.
